name: Der Backzutatenverband e.V.
goal: The Backzutatenverband e.V. (BZV) represents the interests of the industry to political decision makers and government authorities on local, national, and European level. The BZV cooperates in developing the framework conditions of the industry (fair competition, contact with other national and international trade and umbrella organisations, networks with important multipliers from all public fields). The BZV advises and assists its members in economic, legal or public issues affecting the industry and promotes the exchange of experience and information among its members.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Public Health, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: The BZV follows the current legislation on European and national level and makes amendments.
